language.name: English
cyan.message.notOp: §cYou don't have the required permission to do that
cyan.message.playerNotFound: §cPlayer not found. The player must be online
cyan.message.disabled.bed: §cThe /bed command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/cyan config booleanOptions allowBed true' in chat
cyan.message.disabled.kgi: §cThe /kgi command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/cyan config booleanOptions allowKgi true' in chat
cyan.message.disabled.surface: §cThe /surface command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/cyan config booleanOptions allowSurface true' in chat
cyan.message.servOnly: §cThis command can only be used on servers
cyan.message.bed.error: §cYou don't have an attributed bed or respawn anchor
cyan.message.playerOnlyCmd: §cThis command can only be executed by a player
cyan.message.locationAlreadyExists: §cA location with this name already exists
cyan.message.disabled.locations: §cThe locations commands are disabled. To enable them, enter '/cyan config booleanOptions allowLocations true' in chat
cyan.message.locationNotFound: §cThe location %s §cdoesn't exist (check if you spelled it correctly)
cyan.message.bed: §3You have been teleported to your bed
cyan.message.respawnAnchor: §3You have been teleported to your respawn anchor
cyan.message.surface: §3You have been teleported to the surface
cyan.message.kgir: §3Ground items have been removed in a radius of %s §3chunks
cyan.message.goToLocation: §3You have been teleported to the location %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeModifConfi: §3The minimum OP level to edit the config is now %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeBed: §3The minimum OP level to execute §d/bed §3is now %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeKgi: §3The minimum OP level to execute §d/kgi §3is now %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeSurface: §3The minimum OP level to execute §d/surface §3is now %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeLocation: §3The minimum OP level to see / teleport to locations is now %s
cyan.message.set.minOpLevelExeEditLocati: §3The minimum OP level to edit locations is now %s
cyan.message.getCfgOptions.minOpLevelExe: - §3Minimum OP level to see / teleport to locations §3: %s
cyan.message.getDescription.command.head: §3Description of the §d/%s §3command :
cyan.message.getDescription.command.bed: §3The §d/bed §3command teleports you to your bed or respawn anchor
cyan.message.getDescription.command.kgi:
§3The §d/kgi §3command kills every item that is on the ground in a specific radius.
§d/kgi §3to kill items in the default radius (defined in the config, can be changed).
§d/kgi [distance_in_chunks] §3to kill items in the specified radius
cyan.message.getDescription.command.surf: §3The §d/surface §3command teleports you to the highest block located at your position
cyan.message.getDescription.options.head: §3Description of the §d%s §3option :
cyan.message.getDescription.options.useT: - §euseTranslations §3option toogles the use of translations (server-side only)
cyan.message.getDescription.options.msgT: - §emsgToActionBar §3option determines if messages are send to the chat or the player's action bar
cyan.message.getDescription.options.erro: - §eerrorToActionBar §3option determines if error messages are send to the chat or the player's action bar
cyan.message.getDescription.options.minO: - §eminOpLevelExeLocation §3determines the minimum OP level required to see / teleport to locations
- §eminOpLevelExeEditLocation §3determines the minimum OP level required to edit locations

cyan.midnightconfig.title: Cyan Config
cyan.midnightconfig.allowOptions: --- Enables/disables the use of the commands listed below ---
cyan.midnightconfig.allowLocations.toolt: Allow the use of location commands
cyan.midnightconfig.distanceToEntitiesKg: Defines the distance in chunks in which entities will be removed
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeModifCo: Minimum OP level to modify the config
The minimum OP level required to edit the config (server side)
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeBed.too: The minimum OP level required to execute the /bed command
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeKgi.too: The minimum OP level required to execute the /kgi command
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeSurface: The minimum OP level required to execute the /surface command
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeLocatio: Minimum OP level for location commands
The minimum OP level required see / teleport to locations
cyan.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeEditLoc: Minimum OP level to edit locations
The minimum OP level required to edit the locations
cyan.midnightconfig.useTranslations: §cUses one language and not the languages files
cyan.midnightconfig.useTranslations.tool: §cDefines wether the translations will be use (server-side only)
cyan.midnightconfig.msgToActionBar.toolt: Defines if the messages wil be send through the chat or the action bar
cyan.midnightconfig.errorToActionBar: Send error messages to action bar
cyan.midnightconfig.errorToActionBar.too: Defines if the messages wil be send through the chat or the action bar
